affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 形容词后缀, 通常加在名词后

bilingual.source: His angry words undoubtedly fuel the fire.
bilingual.target: 他的愤怒言辞无疑是火上浇油。

bilingual.source: The cheeriest person at the party was undoubtedly John.
bilingual.target: 聚会上最快乐的人无疑是约翰。

bilingual.source: Undoubtedly, the movie was a huge success.
bilingual.target: 毫无疑问地，这部电影取得了巨大的成功。

bilingual.source: Undoubtedly, this is the best restaurant in town.
bilingual.target: 毫无疑问地，这是镇上最好的餐厅。

bilingual.source: Undoubtedly, she is the best candidate for the job.
bilingual.target: 毫无疑问地，她是这份工作的最佳人选。

bilingual.source: Undoubtedly, technology has changed our lives dramatically.
bilingual.target: 毫无疑问地，科技极大地改变了我们的生活。

bilingual.source: Undoubtedly, his performance was the highlight of the evening.
bilingual.target: 毫无疑问地，他的表演是晚会的亮点。

bilingual.source: This success is undoubtedly adding icing on the cake for him.
bilingual.target: 这次的成功对他来说无疑是锦上添花。

bilingual.source: In sports, he is undoubtedly the outstanding person in the school.
bilingual.target: 在体育方面，他无疑是学校的翘楚。

bilingual.source: At the party, she was undoubtedly the most dazzling sexy beauty.
bilingual.target: 在派对上，她无疑是最耀眼的性感尤物。

yingyinNormal.en: Tell me where you took this photograph, what undoubtedly could be called the band's most well-known image?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是在哪里照的这张照片，这张可以说是那个乐队最著名的照片了。

yingyinNormal.en: Undoubtedly another snide response to my repeated letters complaining that the flags in front of the courthouse are flying in the wrong order. From left to right, it's supposed to be federal, state, and then city of Pasadena.
yingyinNormal.zh: 肯定又是回信来鄙视我之前寄去的几封信里投诉了法院门口的旗子次序是错误的，按照从左到右的顺序 应该先是联邦旗，州旗，最后才轮到帕萨迪纳市旗。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: But defining what it means to be a good parent is <highlight>undoubtedly</highlight> very tricky.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，定义什么是好父母无疑是非常棘手的。

examination_example.sentence: Even so, kings and queens <highlight>undoubtedly</highlight> have a downside.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即便如此，国王和女王无疑也有缺点。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

adv. 无疑地；肯定地；必定地

word_family.mean: n. 不确定；疑惑；怀疑；疑虑

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Undoubtedly</highlight> parents want to raise happy children who are confident, capable and likable rather than spoiled and miserable.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 毫无疑问，父母希望培养出自信、能干、可爱的快乐孩子，而不是被宠坏、可怜巴巴的孩子。

examination_example.sentence: In my case at least, my relationship with my parents has <highlight>undoubtedly</highlight> strengthened the longer we have lived together.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 至少就我而言，我们在一起生活的时间越长，我和父母的关系无疑就越牢固。

examination_example.sentence: California has spent years preparing for the inevitable earthquake that will <highlight>undoubtedly</highlight> unleash all kinds of havoc along the San Andreas fault (断层).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 加州多年来一直在为这场不可避免的地震做准备，这场地震无疑会在圣安德烈亚斯断层沿线造成各种破坏。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It will <highlight>undoubtedly</highlight> help you get refreshed!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这无疑会让你精神焕发！

examination_example.sentence: Frank Hurley's pictures would be outstanding - <highlight>undoubtedly</highlight> first-rate photo-journalism - if they had been made last week.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果Frank Hurley的照片是上周拍摄的，那么它们将是杰出的——毫无疑问是一流的新闻摄影。
